the blue mouse 2025 1 pattern begins using the rib needles and the main color mc co 80 96 112 sts if you re using the invisible join method shown in the tutorial video cast on 81 97 113 stitches one stitch will be decreased during the join leaving 80 96 112 sts for the pattern the sample uses a long- tail cast-on join to work in the round and place a stitch marker for the bor 80 96 112 sts bottom hem continue with the rib needles and the main color mc only round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * around repeat round 1 until the hem measures approximately 1 2 5 cm or desired length keep track of the number of rounds worked body switch to the gauge needles and continue with the main color mc setup rounds 1-3 mc knit now the colorwork pattern begins every stitch is a knit refer to the chart on page 3
